error_missing_bot_permission: Kono komando o jikkō suru tame no jūbun'na kengen ga arimasen. Kakuninshitekudasai, Jūbun'na kengen o ataete kudasai.
error_already_autothreaded: Kono chan'neru ni wa sudeni jidō sureddo ga arimasu
error_not_autothreaded: Kono chan'neru ni wa jidō sureddo ga arimasen
error_already_unautothreaded: Kono chan'neru ni wa jidō sureddo ga arimasen
error_unsupported_language: Kono gengo wa sapōto sa rete imasen
success_language_changed: Gengo wa nihongo ni hon'yaku sa rete imasu
success_addchannel: {channel} Jidō sureddo ga tsuika sa remashita
help_description:
Watashi wa EasyThreadsdesu. Jidōteki ni sureddo o sakusei dekimasu.!

Sore irai, jidō sureddo o sakusei shite imasu: <t:1656771527:D>

**Watashi no komando wa**: 
[help] | Kono subarashī herupupēji o nyūshu shite kudasai
[addchannel] | Jidō sureddo o chaneru ni tsuika suru
help_description_2:
[removechannel] | Chan'neru kara jidō sureddo o sakujo
[listchannels] | Jidō sureddo o motsu subete no chaneru o ichiran hyōji suru
[channelsettings] | Change the Settings for a channel
[set-language] | Botto no gengo o henkō suru
help_description_3:
[threadpanel] | Create a Panel for Threadcreation
[set-forum-cooldown] | Set a chatcooldown for new Forum-Posts
[set-forum-message] | Set a message sent to new forum posts
[set-forum-title] | Set a title for new Forum-Posts
help_bot_variables:
**Botto Hensū**: 
{user} | Messēji o sōshin shita yūzā
{channel} | Messēji ga sōshin sa reta chaneru
{guild} | Messēji ga sōshin sa reta sābā
{time} | Messēji ga sōshin sa reta jikoku
{date} | Messēji ga sōshin sa reta hidzuke
{usermention} | Usermention (threadmessage)
ignorebots_newsetting: Botto o mushi suru settei ga on ni narimashita **{setting}**
removechannel_description: Kono chan'neru ni wa jidō sureddo ga arimasen
setdelay_description: Sureddo sakusei chien wa genzai **{delay} Byō**!
setname_provide_name_description:

{date} | Messēji ga sōshin sa reta hidzuke
setname_description: kono channell no sled no namae wa ji no you ni nari masu **{name}**!
setthreadmessage_provide_message_title: message wa nyuuryoku shi te kudasai!

selectlanguage_credits: Kono gengo wa c. Brockschmidt# 0001 ni yotte hon'yaku sa remashita
selectlanguage_message_description: Gengo o sentaku. Kore wa, subete no komando to messēji ni shiyō sa remasu.
setcooldown_reset: Cooldown in Threads is now set to 0
setcooldown_description: Cooldown in Threads is now set to **{cooldown}**
threadpanel_default_embed_description: Click the button below to create a thread
threadpanel_create_cooldown_warning: You are on cooldown! {timestamp} you can create a new Thread!
forum_cooldown_set: Successfully set the forum-cooldown for {channel} to {cooldown} seconds
error_not_forum_channel: The channel you specified is not a Forum channel!
